text: If rank of a matrix is less than size of matrix, then determinant of matrix is zero. So, S5 is true. If 7 is size of matrix and 7 is rank, then number of zero eigen value is 71 - 7. So, here 3 - 2= 1is 0 eigen value. So, S, is correct. trace (4) = Y(eigen values of 4) = Y(sum of non-zero eigen values) trace (A) = 1+4+3=8 So, S,is incorrect.
